sentence: this interpretation of the employment objective ensures it is compatible with the price stability objective in the long run.

sentence: monetary policy has been given full responsibility for achieving price stability.
label: LABEL_1

sentence: this reflects the widespread acceptance of the theoretical propositions that inflation in the long run is principally, if not exclusively, a monetary phenomenon and that price stability (as opposed to significant inflation or deflation) is the environment most conducive to achieving a high, sustainable rate of growth in output over time.
label: LABEL_2

sentence: with respect to aggregate demand management, fiscal policy still plays an important role through the operation of the automatic stabilizers (tax and to a more limited extent spending responses to changes in the level of activity), but discretionary fiscal policy has generally been less nimble than monetary policy and hence had not been used or even discussed much if at all until last fall.
